name: Kraken Pool Party
description:
You are the Kraken...

...all 4 of you.

Each player controls a tentacle. Use your tentacle to do tentacle-y things. Cooperate to destroy as many ships and blimps as possible... or don't.

May the best tentacle win!

Sebastian Andary did the technical heavy-lifting (ie. tentacle physics). I did project management and gameplay programming.

Artwork by Lamine Sylla, Flora Silve and Aurel from Aiko.

I made the music. It's very... minimalist.

I also made the coffee. This is often called "game design".
